page.title: 10St. Audries School
page.content: Our School,{St Audries}is near West Quantoxhead.We are a{Church of {England}school.We are surrounded by woodland and we are near the{Bristol {Channel and Quantock Hills.} The school has 223 girls, 164 of them are full-time boarders, 25 are weekly boarders, 34 are day girls. We start when we are aged eight. We have a library and common rooms, Townhend hall for concerts, and drama.We have tennis courts, a swimming pool and an all weather hockey pitch and best of all a field club for our own small animals. At present we have a headmaster called Mr. Tough. We are lucky enough to have a special computer room, and we in the prep. dept.We have our very own computer. It is great fun.
